file.description: Path to a JSON file containing an array of direction observations. Each element of the array must contain 'epoch', 'camera', 'axes' and 'vectors' for a single observations but potentially multiple targets. 'vectors' is then an array of directions for a given observation epoch, where each element has a 'target', 'noise', 'right ascention' and 'declination'.

from.description: Start epoch for the time interval for which the observations in 'file' are loaded.

to.description: End epoch for the time interval for which the observations in 'file' are loaded.
